pkgmetadata.longdescription: The vda5050_msgs package contains the datatypes (json objects) specified by the VDA "Arbeitskreis Schl√ºsseltechnologien" in their recommondation "VDA 5050 - Schnittstelle zur Kommunikation zwischen Fahrerlosen Transportfahrzeugen (FTF) und einer Leitsteuerung. This package provides the message files which can be used to be (de-)serialized with an implementation of mqtt (e.g mqtt_bridge) or to plain json (rospy_message_converter) or similar.
